list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a place or thing) arranged in an orderly, tidy way.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the books had been stacked up in neat piles
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những cuốn sách đã được xếp chồng lên nhau trong những đống gọn gàng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: done with or demonstrating skill or efficiency.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Howard gọn gàng, giải quyết chính xác

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of liquid, especially liquor) not diluted or mixed with anything else.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy uống scotch gọn gàng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: non-exercise activity thermogenesis (the energy dissipated as heat by a person during minor physical activity, such as fidgeting or shivering, that does not involve a large expenditure of energy and is not perceived as exercise).
